name: 地學通論（二）
comment: 本班以中文授課。新生選課階段限本系大一新生選課。非本系大一新生請於加退選階段選課。
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習◎限大一修習
goals: Being able to understand the basic connotation of knowledge of natural geography.
Being able to be proficient in systematic analytical concepts of physical geography and possessing the ability to conduct physical geography research.
Being able to possess the ability to design, implement and evaluate physical geography teaching methods of secondary schools.
Being able to possess with the ability to collect, analyze, research and develop teaching materials.
Being able to cultivate students' self-development ability to adapt to the future information-based, globalized and diversified social environment.
Being able to self-practice the spirit of physical geography research.
syllabus:
1 Introduction to physical geography (自然地理學概論)

2 Lithosphere and the representation of topography (岩石圈與地形表徵)

3 Geomorphic system (地形系統)

4 Exam-I (評量考試-I)

5 Connections between geography and surface climate (地理與地表氣候)

6 The structure of atmosphere and global climate distribution (大氣結構和全球氣候分佈)

7 Atmospheric circulation (大氣環流)

8 Exam-II (評量考試-II)

9 Water Resources (水資源)

10 Weathering, Karst Landscapes, Mass Movement and River Systems (風化作用、岩溶地景、塊體崩壞、河流系統)

11 Climate Change (氣候變遷)

12 Exam-III (評量考試-III)

13 The Geography of Soils (土壤地理) - visit NTU Soil Museum (參觀台大土壤博物館)

14 Ecosystem Essentials (生態系統)

15 Terrestrial Biomes (陸域生物區系)

16 Exam-IV (評量考試-IV)

methodologies.note: 課堂講授 (Course lecturing and discussion)
參觀台大土壤博物館 (visit NTU Soil Museum)
圖片影像輔助教材 (E-resources: YT and web)

grading.note: 參訪心得 (museum visit report)，地景素描 (landscape sketch)
每月一次評量測驗 (Incl. 4 exams, once in a month)

prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program) ◎Exclusive for freshman
